sentences.en: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.cn: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.en: a reliable method of birth control
Both of them, I may say, are thoroughly reliable men.
sentences.cn: 可以说，他俩都是绝对可靠的人。

sentences.en: Broadcast news was accurate and reliable but deadly dull.
sentences.cn: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

sentences.en: Good old Harry. Reliable to the end.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的哈里。永远值得信赖。

sentences.en: He does not look the most reliable of animals.
sentences.cn: 它看上去不像是最可信赖的动物。

sentences.en: He was a sound businessman, totally reliable and incorruptible.
sentences.cn: 他是个正直的商人，完全可靠，不会被收买。

sentences.en: I just want a good reliable car, nothing flashy.
sentences.cn: 我只要一辆性能可靠的轿车，不要华而不实的那种。

sentences.en: I know she's honest and reliable.
Judged by the ordinary standards,he was reliable
sentences.cn: 用一般的标准衡量，他是可信赖的。

sentences.en: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.cn: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

sentences.en: Richard Dorrington was, in their eyes, a very sensible and reliable man.
sentences.cn: 在他们眼中，理查德·多林顿是个非常可靠的明白人。

sentences.en: She has been reliable and punctual.

sentences.cn: 她办事很有效率，也很可靠。

sentences.en: The witness is unbiased and so reliable.
sentences.cn: 那个证人没有偏见，因而是可靠的。

sentences.en: There was a dearth of reliable information on the subject.
sentences.cn: 关于这个课题缺乏可靠资料。

sentences.en: Trains are reliable, cheap and best for long-distance journeys.
sentences.cn: 火车安全可靠、费用低廉，最适宜长途旅行。

sentences.en: Use a reliable method of con-traception.

sentences.cn: 我们有可靠的消息来源。

trans.tran_en: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on
